description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Vegetable Salad & Crispy Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Vegetable Salad & Crispy Tofu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon barley onto a platter, top with vegetables and tofu. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with pepitas, to serve.
